header.becomeHostDescription: Ready to share your place with travelers?
header.becomeHostInfo: As a host on Visit Iraq, you can:
header.becomeHostFeature1: Create and manage listings for accommodations, attractions, or tours
header.becomeHostFeature2: Share your space with travelers from around the world
header.becomeHostFeature3: Help visitors discover the beauty and heritage of Iraq
header.becomeHostFeature4: Set your own pricing and availability
header.becomeHostFeature5: Receive inquiries directly from interested travelers
header.whatHappensNextDescription: After upgrading, you'll be redirected to your Host Dashboard where you can create your first listing. All listings are reviewed by our admin team before being published to ensure quality.
